attributes.action: call a General Election if he steps down within the next Parliament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A General Election should be held if the present Prime Minister decides to step down.
It would not be correct for a present member of Government to become an unelected Prime Minister in this present Prime Minister's place.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
